author: sky.cactus
content: This isn't evidence that they are bad, just that they are never tried.  Considering that historically all currencies are centrally minted and minting money is incredibly profitable for the minter, it isn't surprising that it is generally not attempted.

author: sky.cactus
content: Inflationary/deflationary monetary supply is what I think most people here mean when they talk about those terms.  Not the price.
